title: Divide an amount into a ratio
question_text: £30 is divided into the ratio 2:3. How much is 3 parts worth?
£40 is divided into the ratio 3:5. How much is 3 parts worth?
£20 is divided into the ratio 1:3. How much is 1 part worth?
£45 is divided into the ratio 2:7. How much is 7 parts worth?
£50 is divided into the ratio 2:3. How much is 3 parts worth?
£60 is divided into the ratio 5:7. How much is 5 parts worth?
£80 is divided into the ratio 2:3. How much is 3 parts worth?
£120 is divided into the ratio 2:3. How much is 3 parts worth?
£144 is divided into the ratio 7:5. How much is 7 parts worth?
